block.p: LARNER--Nathlyn. Wife of the late and beloved Judge Samuel A. Larner. Mother of Mark and Sheryl, Richard and Marsha, Henry and Nancy. Also survived by eight grandchildren, two step-grandchildren and eight great-grandchildren. Graveside service 11:00am Thursday at Beth Israel Cemetery, Woodbridge, NJ. Contributions may be made to United Jewish Federation of Metro West, 901 Route 10, Whippany, NJ 07981 or WNET Channel 13.
